overview: Yaron Orenstein is the Co-founder and Co-CEO of Pops, a mobile personalization startup, which developed an Android application that lets the user to personalize the phone alerts with fun animations and videos. Pops notifies users of incoming messages - whether emails, SMS, Facebook, Google+, gTalk or Twitter - with stunning on screen videos and animations. He is also the organizer of the TWS events (www.TWSConf.com), which is an annual event, aiming to provide the 10 most promising and disruptive Internet and mobile startups in Israel a stage to present their ventures to global industry.
